title: Kalista blood moon skin bug and Rend description bug
body: The mask on the skin disappears when emoting and backing. Rends discription ends saying "Each spear increases rends damage by.."

replies.body:
Hey nateD26,

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the emote issue with Blood Moon Kalista, and are working to fix it! 

Looks like FANTAsticOrange took care of the other half of the issue. :]

**Each spear increases rend damage...** "_by fifty percent_"

The tool tip includes the first half, but the _by 50%_ is implied.
